players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Diana was found dead so suddenly. It's important we stay vigilant and work together to uncover the truth behind this."
Bob: "I'm concerned about the sudden death of Diana. Let's all keep an open mind and share any information we may have to help solve this mystery."
You: "Let's all try to work together and share our thoughts, we don't know who the mafioso is yet."
